website_summaries.verdict: Versatile high-cut boot available in seven neutral colors. Highly rated for comfort and shock absorption.
pros: Feminine detail with heel and form-fitting silhouette
Treads provide good grip on various surfaces, including mud and slick pavement
Pull tabs make putting on the boots a breeze
cons: Elastic detail takes some getting used to if you’re accustomed to more rigid boot styles

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and feminine work boot
customer_reviews.text: These fit a little too snug at first but after a week of wear they fit like a glove! Definitely size up if you anticipate wearing thick socks. I love the little heel, and find them comfortable to wear even on a 12-hour work day on my feet. Even in rain and mud my feet stay dry. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looooove!
customer_reviews.text: Loooove these shoes. They were really stiff at first and hard to get off and on. Now that I’ve been wearing them, they are awesome! They are so comfortable and I’ve received so many compliments. They aren’t as rugged as the originals but that’s what I like about them. They are a little bit more feminine but still utilitarian. Get them now!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon lover

customer_reviews.title: Love Blundstone
customer_reviews.text: I will never buy another boot again. Blundstone are super high quality, comfortable, sleek, and great for every season. Highly, highly recommend going with a pair of Blundstones.
customer_reviews.author: S.B.

customer_reviews.title: Best Boots Ever
customer_reviews.text: This is my perfect dream shoe. It takes a while to break in but is a high quality and superbly comfortable shoe once it has been broken in. I wear it all year round in New York!
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME BOOT
customer_reviews.text: I am a boot person! I own Timberlands, Lucky Brand and Frye but these are the most comfortable ever! This style has just enough heel for me and fit perfectly. I wore them all night the day I got them and it felt like they were already broken in. LOVE! Considering another color!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots!!
customer_reviews.text: Followed the advice of other reviewers and sized up. I normally wear a 7 in Blundstone, so I ordered an 8 and it fits perfectly! I wear them ALL the time and get so many compliments. My new favorite pair of boots since I can dress them up or down depending on what I’m doing. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Aidan

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The ankle is too tight. Super hard to get on and off. Arch seems a bit off too. I wish they were more comfortable because I love the design and heel height. Hopefully they wear in a bit.
customer_reviews.author: MB Eightred

customer_reviews.title: Pain in the A$$ to return
customer_reviews.text: I will never buy from this supplier again. The return process is absolutely horrendous and so expensive!!! I thought maybe I could deal with the tightness of the boots around the ankle but I lost all feeling in my toes after wearing them for about an hour. The boots are very cute but the leather is just too stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney

customer_reviews.title: Best blunnie yet!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shoe. A++ Don’t worry if they’re too tight at first, they will mold perfectly to your feet and ankles within a week or so! Love the extra height, btw!
customer_reviews.author: ros3

customer_reviews.title: Boot leather has little cuts/slices on top of boot!?! The other one is fine.
customer_reviews.text: Valentines day gift to wife. Boot leather has little cuts/slices on top of boot!?! The other one is fine. They are small, i’m gonna check with her if she’s ok with them. Just thought i should report this. This is from seller DNA...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Blundstone BL1671
product_meta.description:
* The sleek and lightweight design of the Blundstone BL1671 boot offers a truly feminine style. 
 * Style number: 1671 (Black).
 * Weatherproof 2.5mm oiled leather upper.
 * Sturdy front and back pull-on tabs.
 * Elastic gore retains its shape and allows easy on and off.
 * Comfort footbed and heel pad for ultimate underfoot support and shock absorption.
 * Cushioned midsole for improved comfort and support.
 * Steel shank for added stability. 
 * Durable rubber outsole provides superior responsiveness and durability. 
 * Imported.
 * Measurements: *  Heel Height: 1 1⁄2 in
    *  Weight: 1 lb
    *  Shaft: 6 in
   
   
 * Product measurements were taken using size AU 5 (US Women's 8), width B - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size.
 * Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: The sleek and lightweight design of the Blundstone BL1671 boot offers a truly feminine style.
Sturdy front and back pull-on tabs.

Elastic gore retains its shape and allows easy on and off. Comfort footbed and heel pad for ultimate underfoot support and shock absorption. Cushioned midsole for improved comfort and support. Steel shank for added stability. Durable rubber outsole provides superior responsiveness and durability. Imported.
